```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
```
#upload data
```{r}
egg_laying <- read_csv("egg_laying_data.csv")
plant_chemistry <- read.csv("plant_chemistry_data.csv")
```

```{r}
plant_joined <- left_join(egg_laying, plant_chemistry, by="plant_id")
```

# Create a scatterplot with temperature soil and n_molar, coloring based on temperature.
```{r}
plant_joined %>% 
  select(temperature_ambient, n_molar) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=temperature_soil, y=n_molar))+
  geom_point(mapping=aes(color=species))+
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=T)
```
